Package sru.edu.group1.workorders.controller

Class AdminController

java.lang.Object
sru.edu.group1.workorders.controller.AdminController
@Controller @RequestMapping("/admin") public class AdminController extends Object
This is the controller for the Administration role within our project. Admin will mostly deal with user data, they are also able to upload excel data which affects how incidents are created by the users.
Author:
Trevor Bell trevorbell030@gmail.com, Ellie Wurst, John Friend, Hunter Minteer

  • Method Details

    • viewAdminPage

      @GetMapping("/Landing") public String viewAdminPage(@CurrentSecurityContext(expression="authentication?.name") String username, org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      The admin landing page, where they can see their profile, see a list of users, and a number of other options
      Parameters:
      username - Holds the name of the person logged in to display in the corner
      model - holds information to send to the HTML pages, such as the username
      Returns:
      the admin landing page

    • adminListLocations

      @GetMapping("/locationList") public String adminListLocations(org.springframework.ui.Model building, org.springframework.ui.Model department, org.springframework.ui.Model rooms)
      Shows all the buildings, departments, and rooms currently in the system, and Admin can add/delete them individually
      Parameters:
      building - holds the information for the buildings
      department - holds department information
      rooms - holds room information
      Returns:
      a page with all known rooms, buildings, and departments

    • userList

      @GetMapping("/userList") public String userList(@CurrentSecurityContext(expression="authentication?.name") String username, org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      Shows a list of all users in the system besides the logged in admin
      Parameters:
      username - holds username of the admin logged in
      model - adds data to be used in the HTML page
      Returns:
      the adminUserList html page

    • ChangeRoles

      @GetMapping("/changeRole/{id}/{role}") public String ChangeRoles(@PathVariable(name="id") long id, @PathVariable(name="role") String role)
      When the change role button is pressed on the AdminUserList page, this is the mapping that gets called to properly change the role of the selected user
      Parameters:
      id - holds the id of the user to find
      role - holds the name of the role to find
      Returns:
      back to the admin list with the newly updated user information

    • adminDeleteAccountConfirm

      @GetMapping("/deleteAccountConfirm/{id}") public String adminDeleteAccountConfirm(@PathVariable(name="id") Long id, org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      Occurs whenever you select an account to delete and brings you to a confirm delete page
      Parameters:
      id - is the id of the selected user
      model - passes the user information to the HTML
      Returns:
      returns the admin delete confirmation page

      Occurs when you confirm to delete the selected account
      Parameters:
      id - holds the id of the selected account
      Returns:
      back to the user list with the deleted account

    • freezeAccount

      @RequestMapping("/freezeAccount/{id}") public String freezeAccount(@PathVariable(name="id") Long id, Users user)
      Allows admin to change a users role to frozen, so they cannot access the project
      Parameters:
      id - holds the id of the user to be frozen
      user - will use the id to freeze the user being held here
      Returns:
      back to the user list with the newly frozen account

      Parameters:

      user - holds the selected users information
      Returns:
      returns the admin to the list of users

      Parameters:

      Returns:

    • processBuilding

      @RequestMapping(value="/buildingsSave", method=POST) public String processBuilding(@ModelAttribute("buildings") Buildings buildings)
      Once a building is added, this is what's called to save it
      Parameters:
      buildings - holds the new set of building information to save
      Returns:
      the admin will go back to the list of buildings, rooms, and departments

    • adminDeleteBuilding

      @RequestMapping("/buildingDelete/{id}") public String adminDeleteBuilding(@PathVariable(name="id") Long id)
      This page is for deleting any buildings in the DB for whatever reason
      Parameters:
      id - will look for a building id and remove that from the table
      Returns:
      the admin will go back to the location list, without the removed building

      back to the location list

    • processRegister

      @PostMapping("/registerAccount") public String processRegister(@ModelAttribute Users user, jakarta.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request, org.springframework.validation.BindingResult bindingResult) throws UnsupportedEncodingException, jakarta.mail.MessagingException
      Processes the account thats being registered
      Parameters:
      user - holds the info of the user to be stored
      request - holds information for the email to send properly, for HTTP purposes
      bindingResult - holds information about data errors
      Returns:
      to the success page or two different failure pages
      Throws:
      UnsupportedEncodingException - holds errors for encoding methods
      jakarta.mail.MessagingException - holds errors for basic messaging methods
